Fun Activities


Treasure Hunt
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

The art of treasure hunting transcends time and culture. It's a pursuit that fuels our curiosity, challenges our intellect, and unites us in a common quest for adventure. This competition is your gateway to a world of secrets, puzzles, and intrigue.
Your mission is clear: decode cryptic clues, follow intricate maps, and navigate obstacles in your quest to unearth hidden treasures. It's not just about locating physical riches; it's about the exhilaration of solving puzzles, the satisfaction of teamwork, and the excitement of the chase.

1. A group of 4 participants will be there.
2. The clues and hints will be given and you have to solve and hunt the puzzle.

This event will be held on 19th October, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
4. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Box Cricket Showdown
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

In a world where cricket is not just a sport but a way of life, "Box Cricket Showdown" is your opportunity to step onto a smaller but equally exciting stage. Today, we've gathered to celebrate the love of cricket, the skill of short-format gameplay, and the joy of playing under a roof.
"Box Cricket Showdown" is more than just a competition; it's a celebration of the spirit of cricket, the bonding of teammates, and the electrifying atmosphere of a cricket match. As you engage in every ball, every run, and every wicket, remember that each play is a testament to your cricketing passion.

1. A TEAM WILL CONSIST OF 3 BOYS AND 2 GIRLS.
2. ALL PARTICIPANTS SHOULD REGISTER THEMSELVES.
3. THERE WILL BE 5 OVERS.

THIS EVENT WILL BE HELD ON 19TH OCTOBER 2023

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. When girls will bat, then at that time boys will bowl using their opposite hand.
4. When girls will bowl, then at that time boys will bat using their opposite hand.
5. Compulsory over for each individual for bowling.
6. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
7. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Headphone Whisper
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

"Headphone Whisper" is a testament to the power of sound, where whispers, rustles, and gentle sounds create a symphony that's both soothing and mesmerizing. The competition is not just about showcasing your listening prowess; it's about experiencing the auditory world in an entirely new way.

1. THERE WILL BE A TEAM OF 2 PARTICIPANTS.
2. HEADPHONES WILL BE PROVIDED BY US.

THIS EVENT WILL BE HELD ON 19TH OCTOBER, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. One partner will be wearing headphones and other will whisper the dialogues given by us to him/her.
4. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
5. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Bollywood Hungama
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

In a world where Bollywood movies have captured hearts and minds across the globe, "Bollywood Hungama" offers a stage to test your knowledge, passion, and love for the silver screen.
Your mission, as you step into this thrilling competition, is to answer questions, solve puzzles, and demonstrate your Bollywood IQ. Whether you're an ardent fan, a cinephile, or simply curious about the world of Hindi cinema, each question is an opportunity to test your knowledge and love for Bollywood.

1. PARTICIPANTS SHOULD PARTICIPATE INDIVIDUALLY.
2. IT IS A BOLLYWOOD HUNGAMA QUIZ COMEPTITION.
3. THIS EVENT WILL INCLUDE 2 ROUNDS. I.E. ROUND 1 IS QUIZ AND ROUND 2 IS BUZZER ROUND
4. PARTICIPANTS SHOULD PRE-INSTALL SLIDO ON THEIR MOBILE PHONES.
5. USE OF INTERNET IS NOT ALLOWED.

THIS EVENT WILL BE HELD ON 20TH OCTOBER, 2023

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
4. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Caption Star
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

In a world where images and moments are shared at the speed of light, "Caption Star" is your stage to showcase your ability to add depth, humor, or significance to those visual snapshots. Today, we gather to honor the storytellers behind the images, the master wordsmiths, and the creative minds who can turn a moment into a memorable narrative.
Your mission, as you participate, is to immerse yourself in the world of imagery and language, and provide captions that captivate the audience, tell stories, evoke emotions, or add humor. Each image is an opportunity to express your unique perspective, wit, or heart.
"Caption Star" is more than just a competition; it's a celebration of creativity, the magic of words, and the profound impact a well-crafted caption can have on an image.

1. A PARTICIPANT CAN PARTICIPATE INDIVIDUALLY IN THIS EVENT.
2. PAPER AND PEN WILL BE PROVIDED BY US.
3. USE OF INTERNET IS NOT ALLOWED.

THIS EVENT WILL BE HELD ON 20TH OCTOBER, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. A photograph will be shown to the participants and they have to write a caption for that.
4. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
5. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.

Paper Dance Extravaganza
ABOUT STRUCTURE TIMELINE RULES CONTACT

"Paper Dance Extravaganza" is more than just a competition; it's a celebration of innovation, creativity, and the seamless blend of visual and performing arts. As you watch the dancers take the stage and infuse life into paper, remember that each dance represents a story waiting to be unfolded. So, prepare to be entranced by the artistic alchemy of dance and paper, to experience the harmonious dialogue between imagination and movement, and to let your creativity take flight. Your role is to be the audience, the art critic, and the admirer of the extraordinary talent on display.

1. THE PARTICIPANTS SHOULD PARTICIPATE IN A GROUP OF 2 I.E. ONE BOY AND ONE GIRL.
2. THE PAPER WILL BE PROVIDED BY US AND THERE WILL BE 4 ROUNDS OF FOLDING THE PAPER.
3. Dance performance will last between 3 to 5 minutes.

THIS EVENT WILL BE HELD ON 20TH OCTOBER, 2023.

1. Every participant must register online on the official Techfest website for the competition.
2. A Team ID will be allocated to the participant on registration which shall be used for future references.
3. Further details will be updated on the website, WhatsApp Groups and will also be communicated through email.
4. The organizers reserve the right to change any or all the above rules as they deem fit; Change in rules, if any, will be highlighted on the website and notified to the registered teams.
